thread.title: Landlord stabbed to death by angry tenant in rent dispute
thread.title_full: Landlord stabbed to death by angry tenant in rent dispute | New York Post

author: Jazmin Rosa
title: Landlord stabbed to death by angry tenant in rent dispute
text:
A Bronx landlord is accused of stabbing a tenant to death Monday evening during an argument over late rent payments, police say.
Around 6:30 p.m., police responded to a 911 call about a person stabbed around near Logan Avenue and Barkley Avenue in the Throggs Neck section of the Bronx. Cops arrived on scene to discover the 44-year-old victim unresponsive with several stab wounds to his torso.
The victim was rushed to Jacobi Medical Center where but was later pronounced dead.
Cops determined that the man was stabbed in the torso by his landlord following a heated argument over the victim’s alleged non-payment of rent in recent months.
The tenant’s landlord, 51, was arrested, and charges against him are pending.
